sentences: Lance Taylor, known as OG Boo Dirty, is an American rapper from Memphis, Tennessee.
Taylor was arrested in December 2010 after a brawl in Memphis and charged with attempted second-degree murder, inciting to riot and aggravated riot.

In August 2013, he was again arrested and charged with several felonies after police in Memphis found drugs, a loaded handgun and more than $3,400 in cash in a vehicle containing Taylor and three other men.
